The backpack of a new member of the Order of Whispers.

—Laranthir

Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 of this miniature with Pile of Crystalline Dust, an Obsidian Shard, and a Gift of Ascension in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Snuggles.
